      • bestPrices

        public static void bestPrices(java.lang.String[] labours,
                              java.lang.String[] materialslabOne,
                              java.lang.String[] materialslabTwo,
                              java.lang.String[] materialslabThree,
                              int[] quantMaterials,
                              int[] quantmaterialslabOne,
                              int[] pricehomecenterlabOne,
                              int[] pricewarecenterlabOne,
                              int[] pricewareneighlabOne,
                              int[] quantmaterialslabTwo,
                              int[] pricehomecenterlabTwo,
                              int[] pricewarecenterlabTwo,
                              int[] pricewareneighlabTwo,
                              int[] quantmaterialslabThree,
                              int[] pricehomecenterlabThree,
                              int[] pricewarecenterlabThree,
                              int[] pricewareneighlabThree)
        Shows the best prices in any of the hardware stores for each material and the best value to pay. It should be noted that this method does not include the delivery prices
        pre:
        post: It will show the best prices for each material and the best value to pay including workforce prices.
        Parameters:
        labours - Labours Array != null
        materialslabOne - Names of the material Array for the first labour !=null
        materialslabTwo - Names of the material Array for the first labour !=null
        materialslabThree - Names of the material Array for the first labour !=null
        quantMaterials - Quantity of Materials Array != null
        quantmaterialslabOne - Positive integer number which is != 0 and String
        pricehomecenterlabOne - Positive integer number which is != String
        pricewarecenterlabOne - Positive integer number which is != String
        pricewareneighlabOne - Positive integer number which is != String
        quantmaterialslabTwo - Positive integer number which is != 0 and String
        pricehomecenterlabTwo - Positive integer number which is != String
        pricewarecenterlabTwo - Positive integer number which is != String
        pricewareneighlabTwo - Positive integer number which is != String
        quantmaterialslabThree - Positive integer number which is != 0 and String
        pricehomecenterlabThree - Positive integer number which is != String
        pricewarecenterlabThree - Positive integer number which is != String
        pricewareneighlabThree - Positive integer number which is != String
